    • Uses of IUpdateStrategyFac in model

      Classes in model that implement IUpdateStrategyFac 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  IUpdateStrategyFac.ErrorFactory<TMsg>
      A factory for a beeping error strategy that beeps the speaker every 25 updates.
      static class  IUpdateStrategyFac.NullFactory<TMsg>
      A factory for a typed null strategy object.
      Usage: instantiate this factory class using the desired TDispMsg type and then call its make() method to create the correctly typed null strategy object.
      Fields in model declared as IUpdateStrategyFac 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> BallModel._errorStrategyFac
      A factory for a beeping error strategy that beeps the speaker every 25 updates.
      Methods in model that return IUpdateStrategyFac 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> BallModel.combineStrategyFacs​(IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> stratFac1, IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> stratFac2)
      Returns an IUpdateStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IUpdateStrategyFac objects.
      IUpdateStrategyFac<IBallCmd> BallModel.makeUpdateStrategyFac​(java.lang.String className)
      Returns an IUpdateStrategyFac that can instantiate the strategy specified by className.
      Methods in model with parameters of type IUpdateStrategyFac 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Returns an IUpdateStrategyFac that can instantiate a MultiStrategy with the two strategies made by the two given IUpdateStrategyFac objects.
